name: Backpack Malfunction
description:
A short zelda inspired dungeon crawler where the weapons you have at any point in time are completely out of your control. The weapns in your use bar change every 3 seconds so you'll have to keep an eye on which weapons you have as well as your position. 

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK jam 2020 under the theme Out of Control.
